brand_protection.title: Corporate Counterintelligence
brand_protection.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.
brand_protection.list_title_Description_desafio: The integrity of your operation directly depends on the robustness of your supply chain, including both external suppliers and internal human capital. Failing to rigorously check a single link—whether a critical logistics partner or a newly hired executive—can introduce vulnerabilities throughout your organization. Superficial credential checks and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most damaging risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, hidden legal and reputational liabilities. Hiring or partnering without prior Background Check analysis is managing your business based on an incomplete and dangerous view of your partners’ operational and ethical reality.
brand_protection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Corporate Intelligence and Investigations service acts as your due diligence and investigation unit. We work discreetly and methodically to verify facts, analyze histories, and uncover hidden risks before they become a problem. Combining advanced open-source investigation techniques (OSINT), data analysis, and, when necessary, field verification, we provide a complete dossier to ensure your hiring, partnership, and investment decisions are based on verified information.
brand_protection.list_title2: Superficial credential checks and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most damaging risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, hidden legal and reputational liabilities. Hiring or partnering without prior Background Check analysis is managing your business based on an incomplete and dangerous view of your partners’ operational and ethical reality.

SectionServiceSecond.title: Our Deliverables
SectionServiceSecond.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.

card1.description: Third-Party Due Diligence: We investigate potential partners, suppliers, or M&A targets thoroughly. We map corporate structures, reputational and legal histories of partners (KYP - Know Your Partner), and identify hidden liabilities or involvement in illicit activities.

card2.description: Background Check (Profile Analysis): We perform in-depth checks of candidates and key employees. We analyze professional history, legal proceedings, digital reputation, and potential conflicts of interest to ensure team integrity and reliability.

card3.description: Fraud Investigation and Response: We investigate suspicions of fraud, corruption, asset theft, and internal sabotage. Evidence is collected systematically, perpetrators identified, and detailed reports provided for administrative and legal action.

card4.description: Internal Risk and Conflict Mapping: We analyze your employees’ ecosystem and connections to identify undisclosed relationships with competitors, suspicious side activities, and other risks traditional audits do not reveal.

SectionServiceSecond.title: Our Deliverables
SectionServiceSecond.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.

card1.description: Strategic Intelligence (Leadership): Executive reports connecting threat landscape (actors, trends, geopolitical risks) directly to business goals and continuity. Analyses answer 'why' and 'what if,' recommending strategic directions.

card2.description: Tactical Intelligence (Active Defense): Detailed dossiers on attacker Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs) for your sector. Describes methods and tools to improve threat hunting, detection rules, and team training.

card3.description: Operational Intelligence (SOC): Contextual alerts on ongoing attack campaigns. Enriches DDW findings with business context, answering 'what does this mean for us now?' and provides high-fidelity IOCs for incident response.

card4.description: Vulnerability Intelligence (IT & Infrastructure): Monitoring and analysis of relevant vulnerabilities (CVEs) actively discussed or exploited by cybercriminals. Allows risk-based patch prioritization, not just theoretical severity.

vip_protection.title: Deep & Dark Web Asset Surveillance and Protection
vip_protection.description: A unified service to monitor both threat actors and your exposed digital assets.
vip_protection.list_title_Description_desafio: Your company faces two critical and invisible risks: the adversary planning an attack and your own sensitive data that may already be compromised. How do you monitor both sides—the hunter and the prey—in an anonymous and hostile environment like the Deep & Dark Web? Using separate solutions creates complexity and disconnects intelligence from action.
vip_protection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Asset Surveillance and Protection service provides a complete view of your digital risk. We unify Threat Intelligence (attacker monitoring) with Exposed Asset Detection (searching for your data) in a single offering. Using a centralized platform and analyst expertise, we correlate criminal intentions with actual data exposure, enabling truly proactive defense and more effective incident response.
